==== Notes ====

Resolution for 1280x800 I used this line:
Hoary:
       Modeline        "1280x800@60" 83.91 1280 1312 1624 1656 800 816 824 841
Breezy:
       Modeline        "1280x800"  68.56  1280 1336 1472 1664  800 801 804 824 -HSync +Vsync
